manageRentals.description: Request and manage your RCPM boat rentals

emptyState.title: Get Started with Your Registration
emptyState.description: Start by adding crew members to your roster, then create your crews.

timeline.title: Registration Timeline & Rules
timeline.intro: Understanding what you can and cannot do at each stage is crucial. Follow this timeline to ensure your registration is complete and valid.

phase1.title: Registration Period Open
phase1.rule1: Register and delete team members freely
phase1.rule3: Pay for crews at any time
phase1.rule4: After payment: You can modify crews but cannot delete them

phase2.title: Registration Closed - Payment Window
phase2.rule2: Can still pay for registered crews
phase2.rule4: After payment: You can still modify crews but cannot delete them

phase3.title: After Payment Deadline
phase3.rule3: Only paid crews will be able to race
phase3.rule4: Only crews with all crew members having valid competition licenses will be allowed to race

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.message: Make sure to complete your payment before the deadline! Only crews with confirmed payment will be allowed to participate in the competition. Late payments cannot be accepted.

semiMarathon.title: Semi-Marathon
semiMarathon.description: A 21-kilometer rowing event featuring fours and eights in all configurations.
semiMarathon.categories: Age categories: J16, J18, Senior, and Master
semiMarathon.crews: Men's, women's, and mixed-gender M/F crews
semiMarathon.clubCrews: Club crews and mixed inter-club crews

marathon.title: Marathon
marathon.description: A challenging 42-kilometer individual race in single sculls.
marathon.categories: Men's and women's in Senior and Master A-F divisions

process.title: Registration Process
process.intro: Club managers register their club and crews through a simple online process. The system guides you through every step.

step1.title: Set Up Your Access
step1.description: Create your manager account using your club's federation details and contact information. You'll receive secure login credentials to access the registration system.

step2.title: Build Your Team Rosters
step2.description: Add all potential participants to your club's roster with their essential information: name, birth date, gender, and FFA license number.

step3.title: Create Your Crews
step3.description: Select races and configure each crew by choosing the boat type, rigging (sweep or scull), and assigning specific crew members to rowing and coxswain positions.

step4.title: Handle Equipment Needs
step4.description: If you need boats, submit rental requests through the system. Available RCPM rental boats will be confirmed no later than 2 weeks before registration closing date, with priority given to RCPM rowers.

step5.title: Process Payments
step5.description: Review your total costs and complete payment using the integrated secure payment system. You can pay for individual entries or process multiple registrations together.

step6.title: Ongoing Management
step6.description: Monitor your registrations, make permitted changes during the open period, and handle any crew substitutions or withdrawals that may be needed.

noRefund.title: Important Payment Policy
noRefund.message: Once payment is completed, no refunds will be possible. Please ensure all your registrations are correct before proceeding with payment.
